## renderHighlightedValue() function

Renders a HighlightedValue with highlighting based on its matchedSubstrings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function renderHighlightedValue(highlightedValueOrString: Partial<HighlightedValue> | string, customCssClasses?: HighlightedValueCssClasses): JSX.Element;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  highlightedValueOrString | Partial&lt;HighlightedValue&gt; \| string | the text to add highlight to. |
|  customCssClasses | [HighlightedValueCssClasses](./answers-react-components-sendhelp.highlightedvaluecssclasses.md) | css classes use for the non-highlighted and highlighted text. |

<b>Returns:</b>

JSX.Element

JSX.Element
